home.subtitle: As a full-stack developer, I am dedicated to turning ideas into innovative web applications. Explore my latest projects, where I am showcasing my experience in React.js, web development, UX/UI, AI, and blockchain.
about.main: Passion is the key to success
about.subtitle: Biography
about.text1: Hi, I'm Leonardo, a full-stack developer with a strong passion for creating the best digital experiences centered on clients' goals. With 1 year of experience in the field, I'm always looking for new and innovative ways to bring my clients' visions to life.
about.text2: I believe that design is not just about making things look pretty but also about solving problems and creating intuitive and enjoyable experiences for users.
about.text3: Currently, I'm studying English to improve my interpersonal communication skills and, at the same time, learning the latest technologies related to artificial intelligence and blockchain development.
skills.title: Skills
experience.title: Experience
exp.free: As a freelance full-stack web developer, I work with small and medium-sized businesses to create custom web solutions that meet their specific needs. I offer development services from designing attractive user interfaces to implementing server functionalities and databases.
exp.dhl.title: Administrative
exp.dhl.detail: I perform SIM Operator and team management tasks, and have advanced proficiency in the Office suite. Additionally, I am responsible for conducting training for team members and managing DHL systems for processing, tracking, controls, and area maintenance. I also handle problem resolution in collaboration with the Customer Service department.
education.title: Education
edu.info1: Relevant courses included Data Structures,Algorithms and Computer Systems Engineering
edu.title2: Student with B1 Level of English
edu.info2: Communication in everyday situations, comprehension of simple texts, and writing of short texts on familiar topics.
edu.info3: Introduction to Programming, completion of various projects, Frontend Development with JavaScript, and Backend Development with Java.
pjt1.title: Metaversus
pjt1.desc: A modern website built on NextJS 13 and styled with Tailwind CSS. It is also mobile responsive and features various types of animations created with FramerMotion.
pjt2.title: Alura Hotel
pjt3.title: Task manager
pjt4.title: CarHub
pjt4.desc: A modern website built on NextJS 13, Typescript, Tailwind CSS and RapidAPI. It is also mobile responsive and features various types of animations created with FramerMotion.
pjt5.title: CalendarApp
pjt6.title: For Them - Ezeiza
pjt6.desc: A website created for a neighborhood organization using React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and the MercadoPago API. It is mobile responsive and has a Node.js backend for MercadoPago requests.
